gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 118, Hawks 113
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Andre Drummond’s 24 points and 25 rebounds, the Bulls defeated the Hawks, 118-113. This was Drummond’s 45th career game with 20+ points and 20+ rebounds, the most out of all active players. DeMar DeRozan added 25 points and six assists for the Bulls in the victory, while Trae Young tallied 21 points and 13 assists for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Bulls improve to 14-18 on the season, while the Hawks fall to 12-18.
